Package de.tum.cit.ase.maze.characters

Class Player

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.characters.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents the player character in the MazeRunnerGame. This class manages the player's animations, position, and state within the game. It includes functionalities for loading character animations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Player(float x, float y)
    Constructs a Player object with specified initial position.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(float x, float y)
      Constructs a Player object with specified initial position. It loads various character animations and sets the default frame for the player.
      Parameters:
      x - The initial x-coordinate of the player.
      y - The initial y-coordinate of the player.

  • Method Details

    • loadDownCharacterAnimation

      public void loadDownCharacterAnimation()
      Loads the animation for the player character moving in a specific direction. The method creates an animation from a sprite sheet, specifying frames for each movement direction.

    • loadRightCharacterAnimation

      public void loadRightCharacterAnimation()

    • loadUpCharacterAnimation

      public void loadUpCharacterAnimation()

    • loadLeftCharacterAnimation

      public void loadLeftCharacterAnimation()

    • loadDownCharacter

      public void loadDownCharacter()
      Loads the static texture for the player character facing a specific direction. These textures are used as default frames when the player is not moving.

    • loadRightCharacter

      public void loadRightCharacter()

    • loadUpCharacter

      public void loadUpCharacter()

    • loadLeftCharacter

      public void loadLeftCharacter()

    • startAnimation

      public void startAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> animation)
      Starts an animation for the player character. Resets the animation time and sets the animation flag to true.
      Parameters:
      animation - The Animation object to start.

    • update

      public void update(float sinusInput)
      Updates the player's animation state. Increments the animation time and stops the animation when it completes.
      Parameters:
      sinusInput - The time elapsed since the last frame, used to update the animation time.

    • getCurrentAnimationFrame

      public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getCurrentAnimationFrame()
      Retrieves the current frame of the player's animation. Returns null if the player is not animating or if there's no current animation.
      Returns:
      The current TextureRegion frame of the animation, or null if not animating.

    • isAnimating

      public boolean isAnimating()
      Getter and setter methods for the player's properties. These include methods to get and set the player's position, key possession status, default frame, and heart count.
